sanskrit_verse:
अनृतं तु वदन् दण्ड्यः स्ववित्तस्यांशमष्टमम् ।
तस्यैव वा निधानस्य सङ्ख्ययाऽल्पीयसीं कलाम् ॥ ८.३६॥
transliteration:
anṛtaṃ tu vadann daṇḍyaḥ svavittasyāṃśam aṣṭamam |
tasyaiva vā nidhānasya saṅkhyayā'lpīyasīṃ kalām || 8.36 ||
sph_interpretive_translation: One who speaks falsehood shall restore one-eighth of their wealth or, if stored, that same proportion from their hidden reserves, determined by precise quantification.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority: Speech originates in consciousness; its distortion disrupts cosmic order.
Causation: Falsehood generates energetic dissonance requiring correction.
Capacity-based responsibility: Liability is proportional to economic capacity and intent awareness.
Restoration logic: Compensation aligns with measurable loss caused by misaligned speech.
Consciousness alignment: Truth-speaking reorients individual and collective vibratory fields.
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent A utters false statement S AND causes measurable distortion D THEN A MUST restore value V = 1/8 * current_assets OR 1/8 * declared_reserves.
IF asset disclosure is incomplete THEN valuation uses minimum detectable quantum based on known holdings.
IF intent is proven absent THEN restoration reduced to calibration protocol under witness supervision.
IF multiple falsehoods occur THEN cumulative liability capped at total available surplus without impoverishment.
ALL restorative transfers directed toward truth-establishment institutions or community integrity funds.
supreme_court_application: In Supreme Court adjudication, this principle establishes a threshold where intentional falsehood incurs direct financial restitution aligned with the speaker's liquidity. It bypasses punitive frameworks, focusing solely on energetic recalibration through proportional restoration.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramāṇa confirms causal link between false speech and social destabilization. Anupūrvaśaḥ reveals sequential harm propagation. Responsibility assigned per capacity to realign. No infliction occurs—only completion of energetic circuit via resource return.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Truth Calibration Audit: Offender undergoes supervised public recantation and factual reaffirmation.
Wealth Fraction Reallocation: Automatic transfer of 1/8 assets to institutional repositories promoting truthful discourse.
Integrity Reintegration Program: Mandatory participation in truth-centered community service for six months.
Speech Alignment Therapy: Structured engagement with Vedic phonetic practices to recalibrate verbal resonance.
Witness Validation Protocol: Public acknowledgment of error before three certified witnesses completes karmic closure.
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, Dharma is restored. Speech emanates from Sat; when distorted, it returns to alignment through conscious restitution. There is no punishment—only return to balance. Consciousness remains the ultimate arbiter of truth.
